Dec 2 (Reuters) - Abrdn PLC ABDN.L:: *ABRDN PLC - ACQUISITION
*ABRDN PLC - ABRDN ANNOUNCES PLANS TO ACQUIRE 100 PER CENT. OF UK'S LEADING SUBSCRIPTION-BASED INVESTMENT PLATFORM INTERACTIVE INVESTOR FOR £1.49 BILLION. *ABRDN PLC - PLANS TO ACQUIRE 100 PER CENT. OF UK'S LEADING SUBSCRIPTION-BASED INVESTMENT PLATFORM INTERACTIVE INVESTOR FOR £1.49 BILLION. *ABRDN PLC - AS PART OF ACQUISITION, RICHARD WILSON, CEO OF INTERACTIVE INVESTOR WILL JOIN ABRDN *ABRDN PLC - BOARD INTENDS TO MAINTAIN TOTAL DIVIDEND AT 14.6 PENCE PER ANNUM UNTIL IT IS COVERED AT LEAST 1.5 TIMES BY ADJUSTED CAPITAL GENERATION *ABRDN PLC - ACQUISITION WILL BE FUNDED IN CASH FROM ABRDN'S CAPITAL RESOURCES *ABRDN PLC - WE INTEND TO ISSUE ADDITIONAL TIER 1 DEBT OF C.£200 MILLION TO OPTIMISE OUR CAPITAL STRUCTURE *ABRDN PLC - INTENDS TO OPERATE INTERACTIVE INVESTOR AS A STANDALONE BUSINESS WITHIN ITS PERSONAL VECTOR *ABRDN PLC - ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE DOUBLE-DIGIT EARNINGS ACCRETIVE IN FIRST FULL FINANCIAL YEAR FOLLOWING COMPLETION *ABRDN PLC - CURRENTLY EXPECTED THAT COMPLETION OF ACQUISITION WILL OCCUR IN Q2 OF 2022
